name: Project Jamaral (Demo)
description:
IMPORTANT NOTES
  • To start game and play new levels, (3 and 4) You Have To Press  A on the title screen. Read New Devlog For More Instructions.
Development

This Game Is Still In Early Access. There Will Be Bugs Until The Very End Of This Game. At The End, We Will Have A Few People Play Test It. They Will Try To Find Out All The Bugs. We Already Know About Many, But Are Waiting Until The End To Fix Them Because Fixing One Bug Might Make Another That Wouldn't Have Been There If We Waited Until The End. Or We Might Block Off A New Level Gimmick Or Feature.

Game

Mr. Amarall woke up exepcting to have much more money to show his finacial class. What he was not expecting to see was his Crapple stocks be stolen by Jeeb Sobs. So off he gose to retrive his stocks from Jeeb Sobs, be his quest might be stopped by an undead army of overworked Crapple employees...

Controls

Z = A

X = B

Arrow Keys = D-Pad

Enter = Start

Shift = Select
